verses.kjv: Blessed is he whose transgression is forgiven, whose sin is covered.
verses.ct: How happy is the person whose rebellion is forgiven, whose sin is wiped away.

verses.kjv: Blessed is the man unto whom the LORD imputeth not iniquity, and in whose spirit there is no guile.
verses.ct: How happy is the one the LORD does not hold guilty, and whose spirit is free from deceit.

verses.kjv: When I kept silence, my bones waxed old through my roaring all the day long.
verses.ct: When I refused to speak up, my body wasted away as I groaned all day long.

verses.kjv: For day and night thy hand was heavy upon me: my moisture is turned into the drought of summer. Selah.
verses.ct: Day and night your hand pressed down hard on me; my strength dried up like water in the summer heat. Selah.

verses.kjv: I acknowledged my sin unto thee, and mine iniquity have I not hid. I said, I will confess my transgressions unto the LORD; and thou forgavest the iniquity of my sin. Selah.
verses.ct: Then I admitted my sin to you and stopped hiding my guilt. I said, 'I will confess my rebellion to the LORD' — and you forgave the guilt of my sin. Selah.

verses.kjv: For this shall every one that is godly pray unto thee in a time when thou mayest be found: surely in the floods of great waters they shall not come nigh unto him.
verses.ct: Because of this, every devoted person should pray to you while you can still be found. Even when floodwaters rise, they will never reach him.

verses.kjv: Thou art my hiding place; thou shalt preserve me from trouble; thou shalt compass me about with songs of deliverance. Selah.
verses.ct: You are my shelter; you protect me from trouble; you surround me with shouts of rescue. Selah.

verses.kjv: I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go: I will guide thee with mine eye.
verses.ct: "I will teach you and show you the path you should take; I will watch over you and guide you."

verses.kjv: Be ye not as the horse, or as the mule, which have no understanding: whose mouth must be held in with bit and bridle, lest they come near unto thee.
verses.ct: Don't be like a horse or a mule that has no sense — animals that must be controlled with a bit and bridle, or they won't come near you.

verses.kjv: Many sorrows shall be to the wicked: but he that trusteth in the LORD, mercy shall compass him about.
verses.ct: The wicked will face many sorrows, but mercy surrounds the one who trusts in the LORD.

verses.kjv: Be glad in the LORD, and rejoice, ye righteous: and shout for joy, all ye that are upright in heart.
verses.ct: Celebrate in the LORD and be joyful, you who are righteous! Shout with gladness, all you whose hearts are honest.
